title: Topology Concept Selection and Mathematical Analysis
description: Research and select a fascinating topology concept suitable for visualization, provide comprehensive mathematical analysis, and define the theoretical foundations for the visualization project.
expected_output: A detailed mathematical analysis document containing: (1) Selected topology concept with justification, (2) Mathematical definitions and key theorems, (3) Visualization parameters and constraints, (4) Educational significance and applications, (5) Specific examples and edge cases to explore
